projects.title: krenital pharma
projects.description: developed entire website using next js. focused on seo and performance optimization. collaborated closely with client on branding and design.

projects.title: dhankhar technologies
projects.description: led development and designed website from scratch. implemented seo, performance, and accessibility optimizations. deployed using aws amplify.

projects.title: horizon 2024 website
projects.description: created a dynamic and visually engaging site for the annual technical festival. incorporated advanced user interactions. ensured responsive design and accessibility.

projects.title: stavya 2024 website
projects.description: designed and developed an animated website for the annual literature festival. used gsap for animations and advanced frontend effects. focused on user engagement and smooth navigation.

projects.title: (k,n) threshold pixel-coordinate based sis
projects.description: implemented a threshold scheme for secret image sharing based on pixel coordinates. utilized cryptographic techniques for enhanced security. evaluated performance and visual quality of shared images.

projects.title: so:sis - storage optimized sis based on huffman encoding
projects.description: developed a storage-optimized secret image sharing technique using huffman encoding. reduced storage requirements without compromising security. analyzed encoding efficiency and share reconstruction.

projects.title: electronic elections based on delfs and knebl
projects.description: designed a secure and transparent electronic election system. ensured privacy and verifiability using advanced cryptographic protocols. developed proof of concept implementation.

projects.title: adaptive enemy agent trained using ppo with hyperparameter tuning study
projects.description: developed an adaptive enemy agent using proximal policy optimization. conducted extensive hyperparameter tuning to optimize performance. evaluated agent behavior in simulation environments.

projects.title: virtual electrical lab with digital twin for two-way live-data communication
projects.description: created a virtual electrical lab with a digital twin interface. enabled two-way live data communication between physical and virtual environments. improved remote learning experience for students.
